sections.heading: supervisors; meetings.The regular meetings of the county board shall be held in January

sections.text:
23-272.County supervisors; meetings.

The regular meetings of the county board shall be held in January.

SourceLaws 1879, § 64, p. 372;Laws 1889, c. 6, § 1, p. 76;R.S.1913, § 1064;C.S.1922, § 966;C.S.1929, § 26-280;R.S.1943, § 23-272;Laws 1997, LB 40, § 2;Laws 2004, LB 323, § 1.

Annotations

It would not be presumed that county supervisor-elect qualified until first regular meeting. Kerr v. Adams County, 96 Neb. 178, 147 N.W. 683 (1914).
